job.title: Software Engineer

of our engineering teamppbrppstrongYour rolestrongppThe software engineering role is all about delivery Trend is seeking a talented software engineer to implement feature changes from Figma to git pushppbrppYoull work directly with our Chief Product Officer CPO who will prioritize the most important tickets Our CPO is a worldclass product manager UX and UI designer who has experience in handling millions of transactions and users per month before Founding TrendppbrppYoull be working in both frontend and backend web development including writing dynamic web backends and writing CSS and JSppbrppSimply put the work you do here will make an strongimpactstrong on both content creators increasing their personal earning potential and business helping them grow their businessppWhat its like to work with usppbrppAt Trend youre not afraid to work on multiple projects and you are excited about working in a fastpaced environment Yes were talking very fastppbrppWe have incredibly
